commands.name: az network express-route port location list
commands.summary: Get the details of an ExpressRoute port location.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port location list [--max-items]
                                            [--next-token]
examples: az network express-route port location list --subscription 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000

commands.name: az network express-route port location show
commands.summary: Get a single ExpressRoutePort peering location, including the list of available bandwidths available at said peering location.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port location show [--ids]
                                            [--location]
                                            [--subscription]
examples: az network express-route port location show --location westus2
